revised_title: Analysis of Cheltenham Mineral Water Composition and Properties
tldr: The author, Conradus-Hieronymus Senckenberg, examines the composition and properties of Cheltenham Mineral Water. Through a series of experiments, he determines that the water contains a neutral salt and a soluble alkaline earth. Senckenberg also investigates the water's bitterness, attributing it to the presence of alkaline earth. The study provides a method for examining mineral waters in general.
